briefdescription.para: Calculates the sign as a positive or a negative int.

simplesect.para: 1 if r is greater than 0, -1 if not.

briefdescription.para: Rounds a value to the nearest nice value.

detaileddescription.para:
If the granularity is 1 the function rounds to the closest integer, at .5 the closest half integer, at 2 even integers etc...
num
the number to round
gran
the granularity

briefdescription.para: returns true for a index each Nth loop.

detaileddescription.para: pass zero to always return false useful for example adding a newline each 10th or 15th line

memberdef.argsstring: (const quatf &f, const float scale, const quatf &t)
memberdef.name: lerp_quatf

memberdef.argsstring: (const quatf &qa, const float t, const quatf &qb)
memberdef.name: slerp_fast

memberdef.argsstring: (const quatf &from, const float scale, const quatf &to)
memberdef.name: slerp_shortway

memberdef.argsstring: (const Range< F > &from, const Range< T > &to, F value)
memberdef.name: remap_to
